不说中国美国这那的，单纯这个狂扇自己巴掌的逻辑我就有点搞不明白了。
你申请美国绿卡被延期，然后诅咒美国早点灭亡？？？就像是你买了个新房，交房延期了，你希望这楼赶紧给我塌?这个像尿路一样的思路到底是怎样养成的？

Update:
不打嘴炮，付诸行动，我在USCIS的网站把她举报了：https://www.uscis.gov/report-fraud/uscis-tip-form



有兴趣的葱油也可以用这个form举报，我把举报原文放在下面。问：能不能在DHS举报这个不要脸的，效果应该更好

举报原文如下，欢迎取用：

Dear USCIS Staff


I am writing to you in all sincerity regarding the hate and terrorist speech towards USCIS and the United States from a Green Card applicant, Zixi He.

The applicant's name is Zixi (Aimee) He, who lives in Daly City, California. Recently, she has frequently posted hate speeches on WeChat, which is a widespread social media platform with billions of active users. In her hate posts, she says:" Shame on USCIS which makes me speechless and disgusting." Followed by this sentence, she says "I wish the whole country, the United States would die and GO TO HELL".  In another of her posts, she says "That the United States is a free country is the biggest lie in the world"

I feel threatened by reading her terrorism speech as an U.S. citizen, especially considering the fact that she will be a Green Card holder. I strongly believe thistype of hate and terrorism speech doesn't only threat people around her, bt also bring potential national security risks.

You can reach out to me via email for the screenshots and translations of her posts. Please help.

Thanks
